title: Talking About Space In Speech, Gesture and Sign: The Role of Language in Children's Development of Spatial Cognition
abstractText: This award will fund a seminar series looking at how languages (both signed and spoken) talk about spatial concepts. We will have invited speakers who work in the linguistic and psychological study of speech, gesture and sign languages. The 3 or 4 seminars will be held over the next 18-24 months. For more information email g.morgan@city.ac.uk
